messages.title: The only way to stop the SNP
messages.content: It won't take much to beat the SNP and elect an MP focused on the Highlands again. Elections in Ross, Skye and Lochaber are between the Scottish Liberal Democrats and the SNP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats oppose Conservative plans to break the 'triple lock' which will ensure that pensioners have an extra £772 a year by 2021.
Scottish Liberal Democrats will invest in digital economy for all, not just for the big cities and ensure local people are compensated when service is poor or does not match what is advertised.

Liberal Democrats will fight for payments and access to a flexible system of farming support, strengthened measures to make sure supermarkets pay fair prices and to ensure agriculture puts money not just into the pockets of farmers but also into local shops, Post Offices and all sorts of local businesses.
Liberal Democrats believe that local people do know what is best for our local communities and for the people who live here. We stand up to the SNP's power-grabs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Local poll results 'real springboard' for Scottish Lib Dems

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Liberal Democrats can stop a hard Brexit. Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum. The Liberal Democrats secure the big winners.
issues.governance: Returning power to local communities. Stopping power-grabs by the SNP.
issues.health: Supporting local health services. The SNP government have been downgrading rural hospitals across Scotland. Must be supported and their families have to travel great distances for treatment. The SNP prefers to go the extra mile for patients, rather than patients having to go hundreds of extra miles for treatment.

quotes.text: Only the Liberal Democrats can stop a hard Brexit.
Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum
The Liberal Democrats secure the big winners.
Local poll results 'real springboard' for Scottish Lib Dems

images.caption: Champions for Scotland's rural and coastal communities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: An MP who will continue to be a local champion. In Ross, Skye and Lochaber it's Jean Davis or SNP. No second independence referendum. Oppose the Conservatives' Hard Brexit.
